title: Wreck fish with beurre noisette buckwheat, crayfish tails and chargrilled baby fennel
description: Treat a special guest to this rather impressive seafood dish.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz crayfish shells, taken from the fresh crayfish tails (below)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 tsp fennel pollen (or ground fennel seeds)
2 wreck fish fillets (or sea bass), skin on, pin boned
